title: Love Me More Than Books! - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Bookworm   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Oneshot   Royalty   Tsundere   Younger Love Interests
author: Takase Megumi   高瀬めぐみ
description:
Milfia, the daughter of the Marquis, loves books more than anything else.
She loved books to the point that she doesn't need to eat or sleep if she has them.
The story of the engagement came up to her.
The other person is the younger prince from a neighboring country.

It is the love relationship between these two people.>
